pageTitle: Re: On-sensor PDAF, will it be as good as mirrored cameras?: Sony Alpha SLR/SLT A-mount Talk Forum: Digital Photography Review
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {6126=As I said "SLR format" Size and handeling wise.. I would suspect there are no more DSLR cameras coming from sony it would be step backward as the mirror is a vestage of older technology. May be one more round of SLTs then it will be mirrorless all the way and any system will support a-mount.}
